exclusion: Triple click the intrusion (button on the front) button.
inclusion: Triple click the intrusion (button on the front) button.
label: ZWA009
overview: Small sensor that offers monitoring of temperature, humidity, dew and mold. Uses a CR2477 battery with up to 2 years' lifespan.
wakeup: Click the intrusion (button on the front) button.

parameters.label: Minimum Temperature change
parameters.description: This value defines the minimum change of temperature to cause an unsolicited report of humidity to the central controller using Lifeline.
parameters.overview:
Minimum Temperature change to report.

This value defines the minimum change of temperature to cause an unsolicited report of humidity to the central controller using Lifeline.

If the value is set to 0, there will be no reports sent to the controller, when the temperature changes. However, periodic reports, managed by configuration parameter 4, may still be active.

parameters.label: Minimum humidity change
parameters.description: This value defines the minimum change of humidity to cause an unsolicited report of humidity to the central controller using Lifeline.
parameters.overview:
Minimum humidity change to report.

This value defines the minimum change of humidity to cause an unsolicited report of humidity to the central controller using Lifeline.

If the value is set to 0, there will be no reports sent to the controller, when the humidity changes.

However, periodic reports, managed by configuration parameter 4, may still be active.

parameters.label: Periodic Reports
parameters.description: This parameter defines the time interval to send an unsolicited report. If the value is set to 0, there will be no periodic reports sent to the controller.
parameters.overview:
Periodic Reports.

This parameter defines the time interval to send an unsolicited report.

If the value is set to 0, there will be no periodic reports sent to the controller.

However, reports on temperature/humidity changes, managed by configuration parameters 1 and 2, may still be active.

parameters.label: Temperature Upper Watermark
parameters.description: If the measured temperature surpasses this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 2.
parameters.overview:
Temperature Upper Watermark value.

This parameter defines a temperature.

If the measured temperature surpasses this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 2.

The value of BASIC SET is defined by parameter 10.

parameters.label: Temperature Lower Watermark
parameters.description: If the measured temperature dropps below this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 3.
parameters.overview:
Temperature Lower Watermark value.

This parameter defines a temperature.

If the measured temperature dropps below this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 3.

The value of BASIC SET is defined by parameter 9.

parameters.label: Humidity Upper Watermark
parameters.description: If the measured relative humidity surpasses this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 4.
parameters.overview:
Humidity Upper Watermark value.

This parameter defines the relative humidity.

If the measured relative humidity surpasses this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 4.

The value of BASIC SET is defined by parameter 12.

parameters.label: Humidity Lower Watermark
parameters.description: If the measured temperature drops below this relative humidity a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 5.
parameters.overview:
Humidity Lower Watermark value.

This parameter defines a relative humidity.

If the measured temperature drops below this relative humidity a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 5.

The value of BASIC SET is defined by parameter 11.

parameters.label: Low Temperature Trigger Command
parameters.description: This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 3.
parameters.overview:
Low Temperature Trigger BASIC Set Command Value.

This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 3.

Value meaning:

255 = ON.

0 = OFF.

1 - 100 = Defines a level between 0 - 100% if controlling dimmers.

parameters.label: High Temperature Trigger Command
parameters.description: This defines what BASIC SET command value be sent out into association group 2.
parameters.overview:
High Temperature Trigger BASIC Set Command Value

This defines what BASIC SET command value be sent out into association group 2.

Value meaning:

255 = ON.

0 = OFF.

1 - 100 = Defines a level between 0 - 100% if controlling dimmers.

parameters.label: Low Humidity Trigger Command
parameters.description: This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 5.
parameters.overview:
Low Humidity Trigger BASIC Set Command Value.

This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 5.

Value meaning:

255 = ON.

0 = OFF.

1 - 100 = Defines a level between 0 - 100% if controlling dimmers.

parameters.label: High Humidity Trigger Command
parameters.description: This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 4.
parameters.overview:
High Humidity Trigger BASIC Set Command Value.

This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 4.

Value meaning:

255 = ON.

0 = OFF.

1 - 100 = Defines a level between 0 - 100% if controlling dimmers.

parameters.label: Offset value for Mold
parameters.description: This value allows to increase the humidity threshold for ideal mould environment notification by max 10%.
parameters.overview:
Offset value for Mold environment notification

This value allows to increase the humidity threshold for ideal mould environment notification by max 10%. (default 0 value will set to trigger at humidity levels above 70%)

parameters.label: Temperature Scale
parameters.description: This parameter sets the temperature scale.
parameters.overview:
Temperature Scale

This parameter sets the temperature scale.

1 = Celsius

2 = Fahrenheit

parameters.label: Reset Parameter
parameters.description: This parameter helps reset configuration parameters and the device to factory defaults.
parameters.overview:
Reset Parameter

This parameter helps reset configuration parameters and the device to factory defaults.

1 = Reset all Parameter settings to their default settings.

1431655765 = Completely factory reset sensor and send device reset locally notification.
